db:abstract.db:para: The QDomComment class represents an XML comment.

db:note.db:para: All functions in this class are reentrant.

db:listitem.db:para: QDomComment is part of XML Classes

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A comment in the parsed XML such as this:
is represented by QDomComment objects in the parsed Dom tree.
For further information about the Document Object Model see Level 1 and Level 2 Core. For a more general introduction of the DOM implementation see the QDomDocument documentation.

db:section.db:title: QDomComment::QDomComment()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an empty comment. To construct a comment with content, use the QDomDocument::createComment() function.

db:section.db:title: QDomComment::QDomComment(const QDomComment &x)
db:section.db:para: The data of the copy is shared (shallow copy): modifying one node will also change the other. If you want to make a deep copy, use cloneNode().

db:section.db:title: QDomComment &QDomComment::operator=(const QDomComment &x)
db:section.db:para: Assigns x to this DOM comment.
The data of the copy is shared (shallow copy): modifying one node will also change the other. If you want to make a deep copy, use cloneNode().
